isApiJWTDeclared: JWT token was not found and is required.
noIdTokenExist: The user or file associated with the token does not exist
noAppToken: The application associated with that token could not be found.
adminPermits: You do not have administrator permissions
apiToken: JWT token does not correspond to this application.
gatewayToken: You are not authorized to invoke this route.
